entry.string: Description: first enable workflow hooks for a particular module+itemtype, then specify here which workflow process should be started when a particular hook is called by that module+itemtype. Only non-interactive start activities can be used here...
entry.translation: Descreepshun: furst ineble-a vurkffloo huuks fur a perteecooler mudoole-a+itemtype-a, zeen speceeffy here-a vheech vurkffloo prucess shuoold be-a sterted vhee a perteecooler huuk is celled by thet mudoole-a+itemtype-a. Oonly nun-interecteefe-a stert ecteefities cun be-a used here-a...

entry.string: Start Activity for Create Hook Calls
entry.translation: Stert Ecteefity fur Creete-a Huuk Cells

entry.string: Start Activity for Update Hook Calls
entry.translation: Stert Ecteefity fur Updete-a Huuk Cells

entry.string: Start Activity for Delete Hook Calls
entry.translation: Stert Ecteefity fur Delete-a Huuk Cells

entry.string: Note: at the moment, only one activity can be started in each hook call from each module+itemtype. If necessary, this can be modified but perhaps you might rethink your processes instead :-)
entry.translation: Nute-a: et zee mument, oonly oone-a ecteefity cun be-a sterted in iech huuk cell frum iech mudoole-a+itemtype-a. Iff necessery, thees cun be-a mudeeffied boot perheps yuoo meeght retheenk yuoor prucesses insteed :-)

entry.string: Description: in order to execute time-based activities (e.g. escalation in the workflow process, status change after a certain time, ...), you need to install the 'scheduler' module first. Then you can specify here which workflow activities should be executed, and how often. Only non-interactive stand-alone activities can be used here...
entry.translation: Descreepshun: in oorder tu ixecoote-a teeme-a-besed ecteefities (i.g. isceleshun in zee vurkffloo prucess, stetoos chunge-a effter a certeeen teeme-a, ...), yuoo need tu instell zee 'schedooler' mudoole-a furst. Um de hur de hur de hur. Zeen yuoo cun speceeffy here-a vheech vurkffloo ecteefities shuoold be-a ixecooted, und hoo oofftee. Oonly nun-interecteefe-a stund-elune-a ecteefities cun be-a used here-a...

entry.string: The scheduler module will run one job to execute all the scheduled workflow activities. You should therefore choose an interval for it that is at least as small as the ones you specify for your activities, so that each scheduled workflow activity can be executed on time.
entry.translation: Zee schedooler mudoole-a veell roon oone-a jub tu ixecoote-a ell zee schedooled vurkffloo ecteefities. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Yuoo shuoold zeereffure-a chuuse-a un interfel fur it thet is et leest es smell es zee oones yuoo speceeffy fur yuoor ecteefities, su thet iech schedooled vurkffloo ecteefity cun be-a ixecooted oon teeme-a.

entry.string: Please note that if you stop the scheduler or if it isn't triggered, scheduled workflow activities will not be executed.
entry.translation: Pleese-a nute-a thet iff yuoo stup zee schedooler oor iff it isn't treeggered, schedooled vurkffloo ecteefities veell nut be-a ixecooted. Bork bork bork!
